alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 29 at 12:01AM PST until January 29 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and Santa Clarita Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways that could be impacted by the gusty winds include Interstate 5, as well as Highways 14 and 126.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
